content.body: shu: any ideas how long you'd expect microwait need to wait to be useful?
content.formatted_body: shu: any ideas how long you'd expect microwait need to wait to be useful?

content.body: Also, this feels a bit like something where if used in benchmarks, UA might want to keep the cpu as busy as possible while waiting, leading effectively to the current loop. I wonder how to avoid that
